flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to buy 60*0.6=<<60*0.6=36>>36 pounds
So he needs to buy 36/2=<<36/2=81>>81 weight plates
That would cost 81*5=$81*5=405>>405
Since he bought more than 10 he gets a discount so he gets 405*0.2=$405*0.2=81>>81 off.
That means he paid 405-81=$405-81=324>>324
#### 324

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
